Class PrivateTask

Namespace
MyPlanner.src
Assembly
MyPlanner2.dll

This class PrivateTask is an extension of MyTask used in the planning tool MyPlanner2. It is a private task, such as clean, exercise, read

public class PrivateTask : MyTask

Parameters

location string
title string

The location where the task will take place.

description string

The description of the task.

dueDate DateTime

The date when the task should be ready. Can also contain the time.
